text: Brian D. Wirth is an American engineer, currently the Governor's Chair Professor at the University of Tennessee"Governor’s Chair Wirth To Address University of Michigan Engineers" Tennessee Today. Retrieved 2017-07-14. and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:University of Tennessee faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:University of California, Santa Barbara alumni
title: Brian Wirth
